title: Mount Palmer (Alaska)
text:
Mount Palmer is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Chugach%20Mountains">Chugach Mountains</a> in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Alaska">Alaska</a>. It is located within the <a href="Anchorage%2C%20Alaska">Municipality of Anchorage</a>.
It is named in honor of George W. Palmer, a trader who operated a store near this area in the early 1900s.
